mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, password, nickname, provider, provider_id, profile_image, status, last_login, created_at, is_verified) VALUES (#{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{provider}, #{providerId}, #{profileImage}, #{status}, #{lastLogin}, #{createdAt}, #{isVerified})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET password = #{password}, nickname = #{nickname}, provider = #{provider}, provider_id = #{providerId}, profile_image = #{profileImage}, status = #{status}, last_login = #{lastLogin}, is_verified = #{isVerified} WHERE id = #{id}
